blogPost.excerpt:
The day after signing his contract and appearing at his official presentation, Xavi Hernández has got straight down to work with his new squad, albeit withjout the players that are away on international duty. He also called on Comas, Mika Mármol, Álvaro Sanz, Ez Abde, Jutglà, Aranda and Ilias Akhomach from Barça B. 

Barça president Joan Laporta also made a point of stopping by the Ciutat Esportiva to greet Xavi and the rest of the coaching staff and players, joined by vice-president for sport Rafa Yuste, director of football Mateu Alemany, director of the international area Jordi Cruyff and chief technical secretary Ramon Planes.

SUBSCRIBE NOW:
▶ https://www.youtube.com/user/fcbarcelona

blogPost.body:
The day after signing his contract and appearing at his official presentation, Xavi Hernández has got straight down to work with his new squad, albeit withjout the players that are away on international duty. He also called on Comas, Mika Mármol, Álvaro Sanz, Ez Abde, Jutglà, Aranda and Ilias Akhomach from Barça B. 

Barça president Joan Laporta also made a point of stopping by the Ciutat Esportiva to greet Xavi and the rest of the coaching staff and players, joined by vice-president for sport Rafa Yuste, director of football Mateu Alemany, director of the international area Jordi Cruyff and chief technical secretary Ramon Planes.

previous.excerpt:
“The Only Heartbreaker” the new song by Mitski from the forthcoming album ‘Laurel Hell’, out February 4th 2022 on Dead Oceans.
Stream/buy - https://mitski.deadoc.co/the-only-heartbreaker
PRE-ORDER: https://mitski.deadoc.co/laurel-hell

Lyrics:
If you would just make one mistake
What a relief that would be
But I think for as long as we’re together
I’ll be the only heartbreaker

I’ll be the only heartbreaker

So I’ll be the loser in this game
I’ll be the bad guy in the play
I’ll be the water main that’s burst and flooding
You’ll be by the window, only watching

I’ll be the only heartbreaker

I apologize 
You forgive me
I apologize
You forgive me

And make me the only heartbreaker
So I’ll be the only heartbreaker

-
